title: Tai Yi Xian Mo Lu Zhi Ling Fei Ji
alternative_title: Magical Legend : Rise to Immortality, 太乙仙魔录之灵飞纪
description: Qingcheng Mountain was destroyed and Xuanmen (Profound Gate) suffered a great calamity. Qing Yu's Altar Master Xing Xiang Zi ordered Zhu Dian's reincarnation, Leng Shuangning, to go to Kunlun and fight the Demon Army. The magic power was in the air, and the hidden feeling was bewildering. As the two of them boarded Kunlun, Black Hand was planning something behind the scenes..
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Historical>, <Genre -> Martial Arts>, <Genre -> Romance>]
